PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_FilterTypeCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Filter type common attributes.

PropertyDef.Name: InitialResistance
PropertyDef.Definition: Initial new filter fluid resistance (i.e., pressure drop at the maximum air flowrate across the filter when the filter is new per ASHRAE Standard 52.1).

PropertyDef.Name: FinalResistance
PropertyDef.Definition: Filter fluid resistance when replacement is required (i.e., Pressure drop at the maximum air flowrate across the filter when the filter needs replacement per ASHRAE Standard 52.1).

PropertyDef.Name: OperationTemperatureRange
PropertyDef.Definition: Allowable operation ambient fluid temperature range.

PropertyDef.Name: FlowRateRange
PropertyDef.Definition: Possible range of fluid flowrate that can be delivered.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalMediaSurfaceVelocity
PropertyDef.Definition: Average fluid velocity at the media surface.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalPressureDrop
PropertyDef.Definition: Total pressure drop across the filter.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalFlowrate
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal fluid flow rate through the filter.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalParticleGeometricMeanDiameter
PropertyDef.Definition: Particle geometric mean diameter associated with nominal efficiency.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalParticleGeometricStandardDeviation
PropertyDef.Definition: Particle geometric standard deviation associated with nominal efficiency.
